type.name: org.gradle.api.Buildable
type.description: * A {@code Buildable} represents an artifact or set of artifacts which are built by one or more {@link Task} * instances.

method.name: getBuildDependencies
method.description: * Returns a dependency which contains the tasks which build this artifact. All {@code Buildable} implementations * must ensure that the returned dependency object is live, so that it tracks changes to the dependencies of this * buildable. * * @return The dependency. Never returns null. Returns an empty dependency when this artifact is not built by any * tasks.

property.name: buildDependencies
property.description: * Returns a dependency which contains the tasks which build this artifact. All {@code Buildable} implementations * must ensure that the returned dependency object is live, so that it tracks changes to the dependencies of this * buildable. * * @return The dependency. Never returns null. Returns an empty dependency when this artifact is not built by any * tasks.
